title: Ping issues spiking from 70 to 1000
body:
Lately, I been struggling to play 1 simple game of League. Doesn't matter what game mode I'm in, my ping would just spike to the 1000s. It started about a week or so ago and haven't been able to play one game of league without dcing since then.

And yes I did sent in a log report. And from lurking through the forum, it looks like I'm not the only one with this issue.

replies.body: This sounds a lot like packet loss if it's sudden like this.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of these games, and let me know what you find.  When you say sent a log report, what do you mean?  Did you get a bugsplat?

I must have went to the wrong one. Otherwise here are the results I got from using the log reader.

https://78.media.tumblr.com/966493a716d5adb9e47f8103024ae6da/tumblr_oy7h0so67X1rqsk1vo1_1280.jpg

https://78.media.tumblr.com/276e16e03459e29007785a4f89328e9f/tumblr_oy7h0so67X1rqsk1vo2_1280.jpg

https://78.media.tumblr.com/c2d98bd3578eed4e952c0728fea6240f/tumblr_oy7h0so67X1rqsk1vo3_1280.jpg
Well I'm glad I'm not the only one. My friend of mine sit next to me playing league with a Normal ping , while I'm at 10000ms and can't do crap.
